de.polygonal.gl.RasterRenderer

type
class

Static Variables

drawBresenhamLine(inline,null) : a1 : Int -> b1 : Int -> a2 : Int -> b2 : Int -> output : Array<Int> -> Int

Uses Bresenham's algorithm for drawing an aliased line from (a1,b1) to (a2,b2) and stores the pixel coordinates in output in the format x1, y1, x2, y2...xn, yn.

drawBresenhamLineMem(inline,null) : a1 : Int -> b1 : Int -> a2 : Int -> b2 : Int -> output : de.polygonal.ds.mem.ShortMemory -> Int

Uses Bresenham's algorithm for drawing an aliased line from (a1,b1) to (a2,b2) and stores the pixel coordinates in output in the format x1, y1, x2, y2...xn, yn.

drawXialonWuLine(inline,null) : a1 : Int -> b1 : Int -> a2 : Int -> b2 : Int -> output : Array<Int> -> Int

Symmetric Double Step Line Algorithm by Brian Wyvill from "Graphics Gems", Academic Press, 1990 Uses Xialon Wu's algorithm for drawing an aliased line from (a1,b1) to (a2,b2) and stores the pixel coordinates in output in the format x1, y1, x2, y2...xn, yn.

drawXialonWuLineMem(inline,null) : a1 : Int -> b1 : Int -> a2 : Int -> b2 : Int -> output : de.polygonal.ds.mem.ShortMemory -> Int

Symmetric Double Step Line Algorithm by Brian Wyvill from "Graphics Gems", Academic Press, 1990 Uses Xialon Wu's algorithm for drawing an aliased line from (a1,b1) to (a2,b2) and stores the pixel coordinates in output in the format x1, y1, x2, y2...xn, yn.
